verses.verse: Then Samuel<WH8050> took<WH3947> the vial<WH6378> of oil,<WH8081> and poured<WH3332> it on his head,<WH7218> and kissed<WH5401> him,<WH559> and said, "Isn't<WH3068> it that Yahweh has anointed<WH4886> you to be prince<WH5057> over his inheritance?<WH5159>

When you have departed<WH3212> from me<WH5978> today,<WH3117> then you shall find<WH4672> two<WH8147> men<WH582> by Rachel<WH7354>'s tomb,<WH6900> in the border<WH1366> of Benjamin<WH1144> at Zelzah;<WH6766> and they will tell<WH559> you,<WH860> 'The donkeys which you went<WH1980> to seek<WH1245> have been found;<WH4672> and behold,<WH1> your father has stopped<WH5203> caring<WH1697> about the donkeys,<WH860> and is anxious<WH1672> for you,<WH559> saying, "What shall I do<WH6213> for my son?<WH1121>"'

"Then you shall go on<WH2498> forward<WH1973> from there,<WH935> and you shall come to the oak<WH436> of Tabor;<WH8396> and three<WH7969> men<WH582> shall meet<WH4672> you there going up<WH5927> to God<WH430> to Bethel,<WH1008> one<WH259> carrying<WH5375> three<WH7969> young goats,<WH1423> and another<WH259> carrying<WH5375> three<WH7969> loaves<WH3603> of bread,<WH3899> and another<WH259> carrying<WH5375> a bottle<WH5035> of wine:<WH3196>
and they will<WH7592> greet<WH7965> you,<WH5414> and give you two<WH8147> loaves of bread,<WH3899> which you shall receive<WH3947> of their hand.<WH3027>

"After<WH310> that you shall come<WH935> to the hill<WH1389> of God,<WH430> where is the garrison<WH5333> of the Philistines:<WH6430> and it shall happen,<WH935> when you have come there to the city,<WH5892> that you shall meet<WH6293> a band<WH2256> of prophets<WH5030> coming down<WH3381> from the high place<WH1116> with a psaltery,<WH5035> and a tambourine,<WH8596> and a pipe,<WH2485> and a harp,<WH3658> before<WH6440> them;<WH5012> and they will be prophesying:
and the Spirit<WH7307> of Yahweh<WH3068> will come<WH6743> mightily on you,<WH5012> and you shall prophesy with them,<WH2015> and shall be turned into another<WH312> man.<WH376>
Let it be,<WH226> when these signs have come<WH935> to you,<WH6213> that you do as occasion<WH4672> shall serve<WH3027> you;<WH430> for God is with you.

"You shall go down<WH3381> before<WH6440> me to Gilgal;<WH1537> and behold,<WH3381> I will come down to you,<WH5927> to offer burnt offerings,<WH5930> and to sacrifice<WH5927> sacrifices<WH2076> of peace offerings:<WH5930> you shall wait<WH3176> seven<WH7651> days,<WH3117> until I come<WH935> to you,<WH3045> and show you what you shall do.<WH6213>"

It was so,<WH6437> that when he had turned his back<WH7926> to go<WH3212> from Samuel,<WH8050> God<WH3212> gave<WH2015> him another<WH312> heart:<WH3820> and all those signs<WH226> happened<WH935> that day.<WH3117>

When they came<WH935> there to the hill,<WH1389> behold,<WH2256> a band of prophets<WH5030> met<WH7125> him;<WH7307> and the Spirit of God<WH430> came<WH6743> mightily on him,<WH5012> and he prophesied among them.<WH8432>

It happened,<WH3045> when all who knew him before<WH865> saw<WH7200> that,<WH5012> behold, he prophesied with the prophets,<WH5030> then the people<WH5971> said<WH559> one<WH376> to another,<WH7453> "What is this that has come to the son<WH1121> of Kish?<WH7027> Is Saul<WH7586> also among the prophets?<WH5030>"
One<WH376> of the same place answered,<WH6030> "Who is their father?<WH1>" Therefore it became a proverb,<WH4912> "Is Saul<WH7586> also among the prophets?<WH5030>"
When he had made an end<WH3615> of prophesying,<WH5012> he came<WH935> to the high place.<WH1116>

Saul<WH7586>'s uncle<WH1730> said<WH559> to him and to his servant,<WH5288> "Where<WH575> did you go?<WH1980>" He said,<WH559> "To seek<WH1245> the donkeys.<WH860> When we saw<WH7200> that they were not found,<WH369> we came<WH935> to Samuel.<WH8050>"
Saul<WH7586>'s uncle<WH1730> said,<WH559> "Please tell<WH5046> me what Samuel<WH8050> said to you.<WH559>"

Saul<WH7586> said<WH559> to his uncle,<WH1730> "He told<WH559> us plainly<WH5046> that the donkeys<WH860> were found.<WH4672>" But concerning the matter<WH1697> of the kingdom,<WH4410> of which Samuel<WH8050> spoke,<WH559> he didn't<WH5046> tell him.
Samuel<WH8050> called<WH6817> the people<WH5971> together to Yahweh<WH3068> to Mizpah;<WH4709>

and he said<WH559> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> "Thus says<WH559> Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> <WH5927> 'I brought up Israel<WH3478> out of Egypt,<WH4714> and I delivered<WH5337> you out of the hand<WH3027> of the Egyptians,<WH4714> and out of the hand<WH3027> of all the kingdoms<WH4467> that oppressed you:<WH3905>'

but you have this day<WH3117> rejected<WH3988> your God,<WH430> who himself saves<WH3467> you out of all your calamities<WH7451> and your distresses;<WH6869> and you have said<WH559> to him,<WH7760> 'No! Set a king<WH4428> over us.<WH3320>' Now therefore present yourselves before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068> by your tribes,<WH7626> and by your thousands.<WH505>"
So Samuel<WH8050> brought all the tribes<WH7626> of Israel<WH3478> near,<WH7126> and the tribe<WH7626> of Benjamin<WH1144> was taken.<WH3920>

He brought the tribe<WH7626> of Benjamin<WH1144> near<WH7126> by their families;<WH4940> and the family<WH4940> of the Matrites<WH4309> was taken;<WH3920> and Saul<WH7586> the son<WH1121> of Kish<WH7027> was taken:<WH3920> but when they sought<WH1245> him,<WH4672> he could not be found.

Therefore they asked<WH7592> of Yahweh<WH3068> further,<WH376> "Is there yet a man to come<WH935> here?<WH1988>" Yahweh<WH3068> answered,<WH559> "Behold,<WH2244> he has hidden himself among the baggage.<WH3627>"

They ran<WH7323> and fetched<WH3947> him there;<WH3320> and when he stood among<WH8432> the people,<WH5971> he was higher<WH1361> than any of the people<WH5971> from his shoulders<WH7926> and upward.<WH4605>

Samuel<WH8050> said<WH559> to all the people,<WH5971> "You see<WH7200> him whom Yahweh<WH3068> has chosen,<WH977> that there is none like him among all the people?<WH5971>" All the people<WH5971> shouted,<WH7321> and said,<WH559> "Let the king<WH4428> live!<WH2421>"

Then Samuel<WH8050> told<WH1696> the people<WH5971> the regulations<WH4941> of the kingdom,<WH4410> and wrote<WH3789> it in a book,<WH5612> and laid it up<WH3240> before<WH6440> Yahweh.<WH3068> Samuel<WH8050> sent<WH7971> all the people<WH5971> away,<WH7971> every man<WH376> to his house.<WH1004>
Saul<WH7586> also went<WH1980> to his house<WH1004> to Gibeah;<WH1390> and there went<WH3212> with him the army,<WH2428> whose hearts<WH3820> God<WH430> had touched.<WH5060>
But certain worthless<WH1100> fellows<WH1121> said,<WH559> "How shall this man save<WH3467> us?<WH959>" They despised him,<WH935> and brought him no present.<WH4503> But he held his peace.<WH2790>
